settings.banner_text1: The World’s Smartest Coffee Designed to Optimize Your Brain and Body

settings.waitlist-featured-paragraph: Light and creamy medium roast coffee with subtle notes of cocoa.
Clear, calm, and energized focus. Enhance your performance and get ready to take on the world.
We test for purity, heavy metals, allergens, mycotoxins, and mold.
Made in FDA-registered, GMP-compliant facilities. Formulated and blended in the United States.
We use the cleanest ingredients only. No starch. No myceliated oats.
Increases bioavailability of beta-glucans, triterpenes, triterpenoids, and sterols in our functional mushrooms.

settings.about_coffee: We took everything you love about coffee,
settings.about_coffee_text: removed what you don’t, and added supplements to unlock your peak performance.
settings.blue_border_text: 75mg caffeine per serving (35% less than a drip coffee)
settings.featured_on_text:
Full Ingredient List: NEUBRAIN Mushroom Blend (Lion’s Mane, Cordyceps, Turkey Tail, Chaga, & Reishi),
Coffee Extract, L-Theanine, L-Tyrosine, Alpha GPC, Collagen Peptides. Nothing else.

settings.waitlist-faq-heading: Premium and Natural. Backed by Science
settings.waitlist-faq-title: Premium and Natural. Backed by Science
settings.waitlist-faq-text:
10 research-backed brain and body-boosting ingredients. Expertly blended and clinically dosed. To unlock your peak performance, all day, every day.


Lion's Mane


The only mushroom with nootropic properties, Lion's Mane mushroom stimulates nerve growth factor (NGF), which in turn promotes brain plasticity, brain regeneration, memory, focus, mood balance, and overall brain health.*

Double Extracted, 100% Fruiting Body.

settings.skydive_heading: Skydive With a Homemade Parachute Guarantee.
settings.skydive_text:
After 30 days of using our product if you wouldn’t skydive with a homemade parachute to stay on as a customer, You don’t have to pay a penny.

In fact, you’ll receive 110% of your money back (you read that right), no question asked.

settings.footer-accordian-paragraph: NEUBRAIN™ is a matrix of 10 scientifically supported nootropics, adaptogens, and prebiotics. It's designed as a superior alternative to traditional coffee, aiming to optimize your brain and body performance.Considered the world's smartest coffee, NEUBRAIN™ acts as a comprehensive optimizer for your brain and body, offering support for immediate cognitive function and long-term health.
